jobs.title: Data Engineer
jobs.description: AFL-CIO is seeking a skilled Data Engineer to support our data infrastructure and analytics needs. The ideal candidate will have experience with SQL, Python, and cloud-based data pipelines.

org.name: AFL-CIO
org.description: The American Federation of Labor and Congress of Industrial Organizations (AFL-CIO) is a federation of labor unions dedicated to improving the lives of working people.

jobs.title: Union Organizer
jobs.description: AFSCME is looking for a passionate Union Organizer to recruit and support workers in organizing campaigns. Candidates should have experience in grassroots organizing and a strong commitment to labor rights.

org.name: AFSCME
org.description: The American Federation of State, County and Municipal Employees (AFSCME) is the nationâ€™s largest public services employees union.

jobs.title: Control Systems Engineer
jobs.description: IEEE is hiring a Control Systems Engineer to develop automation solutions and optimize electrical systems for industrial applications.

org.name: IEEE
org.description: The Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) is a professional association dedicated to advancing technology for the benefit of humanity.

jobs.title: Journeyman Electrician
jobs.description: IBEW Local 3 is seeking a Journeyman Electrician to work on commercial and industrial projects. Must have a valid journeyman license and OSHA certification.

org.name: IBEW Local 3
org.description: The International Brotherhood of Electrical Workers (IBEW) Local 3 represents skilled electricians and electrical workers across multiple industries.

jobs.title: Labor Representative
jobs.description: The SEIU is hiring a Labor Representative to advocate for workers, negotiate contracts, and handle disputes. Prior experience in labor relations and collective bargaining is required.

org.name: SEIU
org.description: The Service Employees International Union (SEIU) represents over two million workers in healthcare, property services, and public services.

jobs.title: Heavy Equipment Mechanic
jobs.description: IUOE Local 150 is looking for an experienced Heavy Equipment Mechanic to maintain and repair construction machinery. Experience with hydraulics and diesel engines is preferred.

org.name: IUOE Local 150
org.description: The International Union of Operating Engineers (IUOE) Local 150 represents heavy equipment operators, mechanics, and technical engineers.
